Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2008...
Injured on 5/6/2009 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/4/2012 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2013, off Rick Porcello (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/2013, off Bunjiro Yasuoka (ATL)...
Injured on 7/19/2013 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Cleveland on 1/31/2015 (Going to NYN: 1B I. Stewart. Going to CLE: LF J. Decker)...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/1/2016, hitting .435 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/11/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,001 per year...
